body:
yasegaman bakari de, mou hantoshi sugita ga, nani ga kawatta ka. dare o aishita ka. atama no naka de ima yume ga kuzure dashita. nantoka nare, yabure kabureba kari de. mou hantoshi sugita ga, nani ga kawatta ka, dare o aiseta ka, atama no naka de ima yume ga kuzure dashita, nantoka nare
, nantoka nareeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee.
